metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38745 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
Apache OpenOffice versions before 4.1.14 may be configured to add an empty entry to the Java class path. This may lead to run arbitrary Java code from the current directory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38745` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreoffice-nlpsolver - 1:6.4.7-0ubuntu0.20.04.7
No subscription required

libreoffice-wiki-publisher - 1:6.4.7-0ubuntu0.20.04.7
No subscription required
